headline: ADP速 Unveils New ANZ Headquarters in Melbourne to Accelerate Growth and Innovation
summary: ADP速, a global leader in HR and payroll solutions, has opened its new Australia and New Zealand (ANZ) headquarters in Melbourne, marking a fresh chapter in its 41-year journey in the region. The move underscores ADP's ongoing commitment to supporting clients with future-ready payroll, HR, and workforce management solutions.

content.title: ADP速 Unveils New ANZ Headquarters in Melbourne to Accelerate Growth and Innovation
content.summary: ADP速, a global leader in HR and payroll solutions, has opened its new Australia and New Zealand (ANZ) headquarters in Melbourne, marking a fresh chapter in its 41-year journey in the region. The move underscores ADP's ongoing commitment to supporting clients with future-ready payroll, HR, and workforce management solutions.

thumbnail.caption: Front row from left to right: Jessica Zhang (Senior Vice President, APAC, ADP), Kylie Baullo (General Manager, ANZ & Japan, ADP), Maria Black (President and Chief Executive Officer, ADP), Virginia Magliulo (Executive Vice President, Employer Services International, ADP)
